chargeHist.descr: Neglecting a Child (No Harm and Child < 6 Yrs or Disability)

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Status conference on December 15, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

8:37 AM Defendant Nicholas G Witt  #00619024 appeared by video.  Attorney Brian David Van Ells appeared by video for Nicholas G Witt  #00619024.  Attorney Ellen Anderson appeared by video for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Chad D Verbeten appeared by video for Asst Attorney General. Heard along with 21CF104, 21CM24, 22CF10.  Atty Ells informs the court of a personal medical condition that has arisen with his family and has been unable to meet with his client.  DA Anderson will be assigned to all the cases, would like to set a conference with Atty to attempt settlement. 21CF147 should be closed, this was refiled with 22CF10.
Status conference scheduled for December 15, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
Status hearing on October 11, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Status hearing on September 20, 2022 at 08:30 am.

10:08 AM Defendant Nicholas G Witt  #00619024 appeared by video from Stanley Correctional.  Attorney Chad D Verbeten appeared by video for Asst Attorney General.  Attorney Brian David Van Ells appeared by video for Nicholas G Witt  #00619024.  Attorney Emily Nelson in court for State of Wisconsin. Heard along with 21CF104, 21CF147, 21CM24, 22CF10. 

22CF10-Arraignment-Waive reading of the information, enter a plea of NG to the single count.  

10:16am Back on the record from breakout.  Atty will be asking for another Status hearing. Set for September 20, 2022 @ 8:30AM. ZOOM.

3:49 PM Defendant Nicholas G Witt #00619024 appeared by video from Stanley Correctional Inst.  Attorney Brian David Van Ells appeared by video for Nicholas G Witt #00619024.  Attorney Emily Margaret Nelson in court for State of Wisconsin. State calls Investigator Zach Dieckman, oath given.  Court has colloquy with DE on his right to personal appearance, DE has no objection to appearance via ZOOM. 3:54 pm Direct by the State. Record shall reflect witness has identified the Defendant. 4:00PM Cross by Atty Van Ells. 4:00PM breakout room. 4:08pm Back on the record.  Objection/overruled. 4:09 Witness dismissed. Argument entered by parties, Atty Van Ells opposes bind over. Court finds PC, will bind over for Trial. Set for Arraignment August 4, 2022 @ 10:00am. Information will be filed within 30 days. Adj 4:17PM.

9:27 AM Defendant Nicholas G Witt  #00619024 appeared by video from Stanley Correctional.  Attorney Chad D Verbeten appeared by video for Asst Attorney General for 21CF104, Attorney Brian David Van Ells appeared by video for Nicholas G Witt  #00619024.  Attorney Annette M Barna in court for State of Wisconsin. Heard along with 21CF104, 21CF147, 21CM24, 22CF10.  DA Barna appearing for today only, cases will be assigned to ADA Nelson.  9:29am Mr Witt requests a breakout room with his Attorney.  

9:44 am Back on the record.  DA Barna clarifies appearances in court.  

22CF10-Adj Init App. Atty Van Ells has not yet been appointed to this case, Atty will contact the PD office for appointment.  Court reads CC into the court record. Waive formal reading of the CC.  $2500.00 sign bond, no contact with MB.  Set for PH June 7, 2022 @ 3:45pm. 

 Atty needs additional time to review discovery in 20CF104, Set for August 4, 2022 @ 10, RH-track other cases at this time and set arraignment in 22CF10.  Adj 9:57am
Adjourned initial appearance on May 24, 2022 at 09:00 am.

03:41 PM Defendant Nicholas G Witt  #00619024 in court with attorney Brian David Van Ells.  Defendant Nicholas G Witt  #00619024 in custody.  Chad D Verbeten appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Nicholas G Witt  #00619024 appeared by video means with Attorney.  Heard along with 21CF104, 21CF147, 21CM24, 22CF10.  22CF10-Init App.  Atty Van Ells has not been assigned to this case as of yet.  21CF147-State has filed a motion to dismiss.  Atty would like to speak with his client in a breakout room.  3:44pm DA Barna appears via ZOOM.  3:52PM Back on the record.  Atty will contact the PD office and get appointed on all Witt's cases.   Atty needs time to review discovery on cases, asking for additional time to accomplish this.  Set for May 24, 2022 @ 9:00 AM. Set all cases at this time, via ZOOM. Adj 3:55PM.
